# AVAudioRoutingArbiter.Category.playAndRecordVoice

**Case**

The app uses Voice over IP (VoIP).

## Declaration

```swift
case playAndRecordVoice
```

## Categories

- **AVAudioRoutingArbiter.Category.playback**: The app plays audio.
- **AVAudioRoutingArbiter.Category.playAndRecord**: The app plays and records audio.

items.description: The app plays and records audio.
